name: OpenThoughts-114k
summary:
_âš  Use card with caution_
An open-source synthetic reasoning dataset with 114,000 examples across domains like mathematics, science, coding, and puzzles.
notes: Developed by Bespoke Labs and the DataComp community, this dataset includes problem statements with detailed reasoning traces generated by the DeepSeek-R1 model. It has been instrumental in training models like OpenThinker-7B and OpenThinker-32B, demonstrating significant improvements in reasoning benchmarks.
